tool_description: Calculates house cusps and determines planetary house placements using various house division systems.

birth_latitude.description: Birth location latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90).

birth_longitude.description: Birth location longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180).

house_system.description: House system: Placidus, Koch, Equal, Whole Sign, or Campanus.

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planetary longitudes in degrees.

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid house system: Use Placidus, Koch, Equal, Whole Sign, or Campanus.
Invalid planet longitudes: Array must contain 10-15 longitude values between 0 and 360.
Calculation error: Unable to calculate houses for extreme polar latitudes with selected system.
usage: Provide birth data, house system preference, and planetary longitudes to calculate house cusps and planetary house placements.

house_cusps.description: Array of 12 house cusp longitudes in degrees

planet_houses.description: Array indicating which house each planet occupies (1-12)
